page.title: 12HEALTH _ BORTH
page.content: There are two doctors based in Borth, with weekday surgeries. The mobile clinic run by the Senior Medical Officer and Health Visitor, for 0_5 year olds, is held from 10.00a.m._12.00a.m., on the fourth Monday of every month at the Oak Garage and by the Grand Hotel. It carries out screening and immunisation programmes and sells baby milks. District nurses and health visitors for the area are based at Aberystwyth. Ambulance and hospital services are provided by Bronglais Hospital, Aberystwyth. The nearest home for the elderly is Tregerddan, some four miles away at Bow Street.
